Name: Teyvat Fried Egg
Title: Teyvat Fried Egg
Desc: With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.\nTake care to eat this meal slowly, and avoid choking the throat of destiny when impelled by the fullness of life's vitality.

Talent.Name: Teyvat Fried Egg
Talent.Desc: Revives the target character and heals that character for 1 HP.\n(You can only revive 1 character via {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food per Round, and a character can consume at most 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food per Round)
